alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:43PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Windham, northwestern Bristol, northeastern Kent, Providence and Bristol Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 842 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Glocester to Foster. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Providence, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, Bristol, Attleboro, Mansfield, Easton, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls and Norton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Western Kent
